ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum stockpiles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build quantum stockpiles which, at a small power cost, will make your storage space four times as efficient.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum stockpiles self-defrag
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows quantum stockpiles to periodically minimize the amount of stored incomplete stacks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum stockpile miniaturization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smaller but slightly less efficient versions of quantum stockpile.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum warehouses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build quantum warehouses which, at a moderate power cost, will iterate over all quantum stockpiles in a single stockpile zone, minimizing amount of incomplete stacks and redistributing item stacks among quantum stockpile cells. Also act as quantum stockpiles themselves, but building more than one warehouse per zone is useless.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum warehouse miniaturization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smaller but slightly less efficient versions of quantum warehouse.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum relays
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build quantum warehouses which, at a moderate power cost, will iterate over all quantum stockpiles in a single stockpile zone, minimizing amount of incomplete stacks and redistributing item stacks among quantum stockpile cells. ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum relay miniaturization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smaller but slightly less efficient versions of quantum relay.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum stockpiles upgrade 1
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows quantum stockpiles to store one additional stack of items for a total of five per cell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum stockpiles upgrade 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Quantum stockpiles store one more stack of items for a total of six per cell.
